alert.note: Alert for Bartow (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:08AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Two Run Creek near Kingston affecting Bartow County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Two Run Creek near Kingston. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
